channel.title: Private For Profit on MicroModa
channel.description: Recent content in Private For Profit on MicroModa

item.title: Academy of Art University
item.description: Visit the official Academy of Art University site to get information on our accredited degree programs. Take art and design classes online & in San Francisco.

item.title: Argosy University-Atlanta
item.description: With the help of convenient locations, flexible class formats, and supportive, accomplished faculty, begin your journey to the career you want at Argosy University.

item.title: Briarcliffe College
item.description: Briarcliffe College, with its two Long Island locations, focuses on student growth in the educational setting. Learn more today.

item.title: Central Penn College
item.description: Central Penn College is a career-oriented, baccalaureate and post-baccalaureate, residential college in the suburbs of Harrisburg and an offsite location in Lancaster Pennsylvania. Central Penn offers bachelor's and associate degree programs for both traditional and continuing education students by providing hands-on and online distance education taught by experienced, caring faculty.

item.title: Charlotte School of Law
item.description: Charlotte School of Law is located in North Carolina. A legal education may be the biggest investment you will make in your life. Make sure you choose a school that offers a degree looking to the future rather than to the past.

item.title: Charter College-Anchorage
item.description: Looking for a change? Jump-start your career at Charter College. Our nationally accredited programs provide new career opportunities in many growing industries.

item.title: Columbia Southern University
item.description: CSU is a completely online university offering degree programs, open enrollment, affordable tuition rates and flexible learning methods designed to accommodate your life.

item.title: DigiPen Institute of Technology
item.description: DigiPen offers degree programs in Video Game Programming, Game Design, Animation, Computer Science, Sound Design, and Computer Engineering. Graduate degree programs include MS in Computer Science and MFA in Digital Arts. Youth and Continuing Education year-round in Redmond and online.

item.title: Fashion Institute of Design & Merchandising-Los Angeles
item.description: Learn all about FIDM, one of the top fashion schools in the U.S., featuring 26 creative majors such as Fashion Design and Fashion Merchandising. Get an overview of admissions, events, visiting the college, and campus life and hear from students, alumni, and faculty.

item.title: Full Sail University
item.description: Full Sail University offers campus and online degree programs that are designed for the world of entertainment and media. Offering associate’s, bachelor’s, and master’s degrees, Full Sailâs approach is centered on real-world industry experience.

item.title: Grand Canyon University
item.description: Grand Canyon University is a private Christian university offering bachelor’s, master’s or doctoral programs. Take classes at our Phoenix campus or online university.

item.title: Harrison College-Indianapolis
item.description: Learn more about the programs and courses offered at a Harrison College campus near you.
